songs.title: Flaws (The Chainsmokers Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
When all of your flaws and all of my flaws are laid out one by one
A wonderful part of the mess that we made
We pick ourselves undone

[Pre-Chorus]
There's a hole in my soul
I can't fill it, I can't fill it
There's a hole in my soul
Can you fill it? Can you fill it?

[Chorus]
You have always worn your flaws upon your sleeve
And I have always buried them deep beneath the ground
Dig them up, let's finish what we've started
Dig them up, so nothing's left unturned

[Instrumental Break]

[Post-Chorus]
All of your flaws and all of your flaws
And all of your flaws and all of your flaws
And all of your flaws and all of your flaws
Are counted

[Chorus]
You have always worn your flaws upon your sleeve
And I have always buried them deep beneath the ground
Dig them up, let's finish what we've started
Dig them up, so nothing's left unturned

[Instrumental Break]

[Post-Chorus]
All of your flaws and all of your flaws
And all of your flaws and all of your flaws
And all of your flaws and all of your flaws
And all of your flaws and all of your flaws
And all of your flaws and all of your flaws
And all of your flaws and all of your flaws
And all of your flaws and all of your flaws
Are counted

[Instrumental Break]

[Post-Chorus]
All of your flaws and all of your flaws
And all of your flaws and all of your flaws
And all of your flaws and all of your flaws
And all of your flaws are counted
